alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 29 at 9:33AM EDT until August 30 at 10:33PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Riverview near US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. .Storm surge associated with Hurricane Idalia is expected to cause major flooding on lower portions of the Alafia river on Wednesday. For the Alafia...including Lithia , Riverview near US 301...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Alafia River at Riverview near US 301. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, Water begins to impact homes on Pine Avenue and Park Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 1.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 4.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 5.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.0 feet on 09/26/2004. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (9 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Alafia River Riverview near US 4.2 1.9 Tue 9 am 4.2 0.5 -0.7 -0.9 -0.2 &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1115 PM EDT.
